column2: Dark Tower: The Drawing of the Three - The Prisoner (2014) #5
column6: CONCLUDING THIS CHILLING CHAPTER OF STEPHEN KING'S DARK FANTASY EPIC! - With magic doors appearing, his eyes changing color, strange voices in his head, and monstrous lobstrosities hungry for his flesh, can the drug-addled Eddie Dean survive his desperate mission to Miami? - A bold new chapter comes to a chilling conclusion by writers Peter David (All-New X-Factor) and Robin Furth (The Dark Tower: A Complete Concordance), and artist Piotr Kowalski (Marvel Knights: Hulk)!
column8: | writer:Peter David | writer:Robin Furth | penciller:Piotr Kowalski | penciller (cover):Julian Totino Tedesco
